Topic.Title: I Got my Fing Game Published!

Posts.EditableText:
I decided to pulblish "Fing game." It had gotten long enough.

I made it in a rage, after some possible PTSD, and many nightmares.

18+, lots of swearing, violence, RPG combat

Link here. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/fo9bej7z0kqiy_wxal2tcq/fing-game

Enjoy the birth of my nightmares.

Posts.EditableText:
Fing game, redux! Brought back!

Link. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/fo9bej7z0kqiy_wxal2tcq/fing-game

It's all fixed! It has an ending! (It did before, but a mistake with the exits caused it to be impossible to get to.) And it has a proper picture now! The description glitches are even fixed!
